title: I'm pursuing BA philosophy from IGNOU and I want to do ma philosophy from DU.. can anyone tell me . What should I do? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello! It’s such a relief to know you’re pursuing ba in Philosophy. I want to do the same. Can you tell me which program Philosophy falls under. I’m having trouble finding it in the options while applying online at IGNOU
After getting in degree and grade card from Ur ignou regional centre.U can take admission from Du with the admission process of du
